price: Mmom εyε ahummͻborͻ a efiri Yεn nkyεn, ne anigyedeε de kͻpem εberε ( a yɛahyε).
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
